name: Klawf
description: The Ambush Pokémon. Klawf hangs upside-down from cliffs, waiting for prey. But Klawf can’t remain in this position for long because its blood rushes to its head.

abilities.name: Anger Shell
abilities.description: When this Pokémon's HP drops below half its maximum HP, its AC drops by 2, but its STR and DEX scores each increase by 2, up to a maximum of 22. After a long rest, this Pokémon's AC, STR, and DEX return to their former values.

abilities.name: Shell Armor
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to extra damage dealt by a Critical Hit.

abilities.name: Regenerator
abilities.description: Once per long rest, this Pokémon regains hit points equal to its level when it returns to its Pokéball.
